name: create-note
description: Creates a note or comment on an entity (task, work order, project). Notes are stored for human review and can be used for documentation or communication purposes.

entity_type.description: The type of entity to attach the note to (task, work_order, project, party, deliverable)

entity_id.description: The ID of the entity to attach the note to

note_type.description: The type of note (general, status_update, feedback, decision, blocker, question). Default: general

agent_id.description: The ID of the AI agent creating the note (for activity logging)

team_id.description: The ID of the team (for activity logging)
